bakeCookies.description: Whip up some delicious holiday cookies. Get creative with shapes, decorations, and flavors that everyone will enjoy.

buildSnowman.description: Embrace the snowy weather by building a snowman. Don't forget the carrot nose and cozy scarf!

christmasMarket.title: Visit a Christmas Market
christmasMarket.description: Explore a local Christmas market. Enjoy festive foods, handcrafted gifts, and the warm holiday atmosphere.

assignments.title: How do assignments work?
assignments.answer: Assignments are made randomly and automatically, ensuring no one gets their own name and everyone has someone to gift to.

security.title: Is my exchange secure?
security.answer: Yes, your information is secure. We use end-to-end encryption and never share your data with third parties.

budget.title: How do I manage the budget?
budget.answer: You can set a fixed budget for the entire group or allow individual budgets. The system will ensure everyone knows the limits.

participants.title: How many participants can I add?
participants.answer: You can add as many participants as you want. The system is designed to handle groups of any size.

emails.title: How do email notifications work?
emails.answer: Each participant will receive an email with their secret assignment and all necessary information to participate.

multiple.title: Can I organize multiple exchanges?
multiple.answer: Yes, you can organize as many exchanges as you want. Each exchange is managed independently.
